channel.title: async on David Calhoun's blog
channel.description: Recent content in async on David Calhoun's blog

item.title: async.parallel with a simple timeout (node.js)
item.description: ⚠️ Warning: this is an old article and may include information that’s out of date. ⚠️ A while back I had a need for a general timeout option for async.parallel and was surprised I couldn’t find much information about how to do it. I was using async.parallel to make a lot of REST calls in parallel, but one of them was getting blocked by a firewall, resulting in an eventual timeout minutes later.

item.title: Top ten things HTML5 makes simpler
item.description: ⚠️ Warning: this is an old article and may include information that’s out of date. ⚠️ General word of caution: not all of these HTML5 simplifications are compatible with older browsers. Test it for yourself before implementing! 1. The doctype Old 1 <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/strict.dtd"> New 1 <!DOCTYPE html> 2. charset Old 1 <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" /> New 1 <meta charset="utf-8" /> 3.
